meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed an antihypertensive medication to help lower my high blood pressure.
meanings.sent2: Regular exercise and a healthy diet can have antihypertensive effects on your overall health.
meanings.sent3: I guess I'll have to start eating more vegetables if I want to be as antihypertensive as a superhero!
meanings.sent4: Her calming presence was like an antihypertensive balm for his anxious mind.
meanings.sent5: The soothing music had an antihypertensive effect on the stressed-out patients in the waiting room.

meanings.definition: A drug or treatment that lowers high blood pressure.
meanings.sent1: My doctor prescribed an antihypertensive to help manage my high blood pressure.
meanings.sent2: It is important to take your antihypertensive medication regularly as directed by your healthcare provider.
meanings.sent3: The antihypertensive pills were so big, they looked like they could double as horse tranquilizers!
meanings.sent4: His daily dose of antihypertensive was like a shield protecting him from the dangers of untreated hypertension.
meanings.sent5: The pharmacist explained how the antihypertensive works to regulate blood pressure in a simple and easy-to-understand way.
